name: where-is-my-corolla
description: Telegram bot for knowing where your fancy new Corolla is

scripts.start:dev: export WHERE_IS_MY_COROLLA_APITOKEN=<your-telegram-bot-apitoken> && export WHERE_IS_MY_COROLLA_USERNAME=<your-toyota-username> && export WHERE_IS_MY_COROLLA_PASSWORD=<your-toyota-password> && tsx watch src/index.ts

author: José María Hernández Martos
